titleStmt.title: His Maiesties two speeches one to the knights, gentlemen, and freeholders of the county of Lincoln at Lincoln : whereunto is added votes concerning the raising of an army for the Northerne parts in defence of the King and Parliament under the command of the Earle of Essex, generall of the foot, and the Earle of Bedford, generall of the horse.
titleStmt.author: Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
